# Wheeler Keeper - Django Car Maintenance Logger

This is a Django-based car maintenance logging application with Docker containerization.

## Project Structure
- Django web application for logging car maintenance records
- PostgreSQL database backend
- Docker containerization with docker-compose
- Environment-based configuration

## Development Guidelines
- Use Django best practices for models, views, and templates
- Follow Docker containerization patterns
- Maintain database migrations properly
- Use environment variables for sensitive configuration
